short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A sidekick for my lovely daughter to learn Chinese. Just select the text and click the extension icon to listen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read any text you select in Chrome browser. Open Extension Options page to choose language and speed.

If you are running Chrome OS 67, there is no Chinese or Japanese. Chrome OS will allow you to select more voices. More details can be found at:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/axs-chrome-discuss/zbJpG8yOcZ0

Know Issues
==========

Update Log
==========
1.0.8 Bug Fix - Incorrect display on certain web pages.
1.0.7 Enhance - Automatically select current sentence in CC.
1.0.6 Enhance - Handle comma and period in numbers correctly.
1.0.5 Enhance - Removed hard coded list of voices.
      Enhance - User can choose voice instead of language.
1.0.4 Enhance - Add CC controls: Play/Pause, Prev, Next, Repeat and Stop.
1.0.3 Enhance - Display Close Captioning right below the selection.
      Bug Fix - First sentence of new paragraph may not display CC panel.
1.0.2 Enhance - Add Close Captioning to help focusing and tracking progress.
1.0.1 Bug Fix - Premature ending while reading long text.
